summary: A test suite dedicated to validating the DeiT vision transformer implementation, adapting generic model tests to account for DeiT’s unique input handling and exercising its configuration, classification, masked image modeling, pretrained loading, problem type handling, and training features such as gradient checkpointing.
business_intent: Ensure the DeiT model functions correctly across core functionalities—configuration, inference for image classification and masked image modeling, loading from pretrained checkpoints, handling of problem types, and training stability with gradient checkpointing—so that it meets quality standards before release.
